segments.text: Good afternoon , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello . I've been told to come in and see someone about my L / C . I just had a message to come in and see someone called Kristy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I received a letter asking me to come in and see you . I'm Mr Simons from Dalton's Electrics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . Hello Mr Simons . I have some information about your L / C amendment . The negotiating bank has just informed us that the 3rd party does not wish to accept the amendment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh dear ! Where should I go from here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd recommend going back to the 3rd party , personally this time , and discussing what exactly it is they aren't happy with . Hopefully you can reach some sort of agreement , which is viable for everyone .
segments.speaker: S1
